synopsis:
Years after his victory at Megalonia, Joe has become a completely different man, going from one underground ring to another, now fighting as the wandering boxer Nomad.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: La desesperación da coraje a los cobardes

synopsis:
Joe gets his motorcycle stolen by a boy named Mio and ends up at a settlement for immigrants where he runs into Chief again.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Si deseas la dañina pudrición de las raíces, no bloquees la boca del ánfora

synopsis:
Joe helps Chief get ready to fight in the upcoming tournament while dealing with his own demons.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Si la flor del alma florece, el amor no se perderá

synopsis:
Chief fights in the last match of the tournament. Will he be victorious?

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: La tierra prometida respondió que el mesías no se quedará

synopsis:
Joe heads back home to face his past.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Aunque estés consciente de tu impotencia, Dios te ofrecerá su imagen para que la pises

synopsis:
Sachio ends up injuring a Megalo-boxer after they caused trouble at Bonjiri's shop. In retaliation, the Megalo-boxer comes back and trashes the place and steals the deed to the shop.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: El tonto que muestra su carta no es un payaso estúpido

synopsis:
Lieu finds out Joe is back in town and asks him to be his sparring partner. Mac Rosario had once lost everything, but made a miraculous comeback as the local hero.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Al principio del fin, la trayectoria del arcoíris dibuja un soportal

synopsis:
Mac and Liu face off in the ring finally. Maya goes to talk to Sakuma after she finds Mac acting strange.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Una sola mano no basta para vivir, pero aun así la forma de vivir prevalece

synopsis:
Joe continues to try to rebuild Gym Nowhere and Yukiko has some questions for Sakuma about BES.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Las derrotas pasadas son acompañadas por señales de buena suerte

synopsis:
The executives don't like Yukiko's decision to possibly end the company's partnership with ROSCO. Meanwhile, Joe and Sachio settle things once and for all.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Cuando te quitas la armadura que no te podías quitar, brotan las semillas de la miseria y de la dicha

synopsis:
It's decided that Mac and Joe will get into the ring together, but Mac finds out something shocking from Maya...

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: Aunque las ovaciones se callen, la voz de los mudos no desaparecerá

synopsis:
Mac falls into despair when he finds out the truth and encounters a familiar face from his past.

(Source: Funimation)

title.en: El con alas lleva al sin alas, y el sin alas bendice al con alas

synopsis:
Joe and Mac head into the ring to have their legendary match.

(Source: Funimation)
